definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To form a rim on.
( transitive ) To follow the contours , possibly creating a circuit .
examples: A walking path rims the island.

definitions.definition: ( transitive or intransitive , of a ball ) To roll around a rim.
examples: The golf ball rimmed the cup.
The basketball rimmed in and out.

definitions.definition: ( bartending ) To coat the rim of a glass with salt or another powder.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To form a rim on.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To follow the contours , possibly creating a circuit .
( transitive or intransitive , of a ball ) To roll around a rim.
( bartending ) To coat the rim of a glass with salt or another powder.

definitions.definition: To lick the anus of a partner as a sexual act; to perform anilingus .

main_definition: ( vulgar , slang ) To lick the anus of a partner as a sexual act; to perform anilingus .
